department had a requirement for a single source of truth for what had been a dispersed collection of personal engineers opensource tools that served information for disaster recovery and notification bulk of the specification was a MySQL Workbench document from a stakeholder who designed the same thing at Cisco Setup schema Setup pipelines to query interdepartmental databases using SQLAlchemy and
